conditions.name: On key code pressed
conditions.description: Test for a key pressed by its numeric key code.

params.name: Keycode
params.description: Choose a numeric key code to test.

conditions.name: Key code is down
conditions.description: Test if a keyboard key is currently held down by its numeric key code.

params.name: Keycode
params.description: Choose a numeric key code to test.

conditions.name: On key code released
conditions.description: Test for a key released by its numeric key code.

params.name: Keycode
params.description: Choose a numeric key code to test.

conditions.name: On key pressed
conditions.description: Triggered when a keyboard key is pressed.

params.name: Key
params.description: Choose a key.  Note that international users and users on different operating systems or devices may not have the same keys available.

conditions.name: On any key pressed
conditions.description: Triggered when any keyboard key is pressed.

conditions.name: On any key released
conditions.description: Triggered when any keyboard key is released.

conditions.name: Key is down
conditions.description: Test if a keyboard key is currently held down.

params.name: Key
params.description: Choose a key.  Note that international users and users on different operating systems or devices may not have the same keys available.

conditions.name: On key released
conditions.description: Triggered when a keyboard key is released.

params.name: Key
params.description: Choose a key.  Note that international users and users on different operating systems or devices may not have the same keys available.

conditions.name: On left/right key pressed
conditions.description: Triggered when a specific left or right keyboard key is pressed, e.g. left shift.

conditions.name: On left/right key released
conditions.description: Triggered when a specific left or right keyboard key is released, e.g. left shift.

conditions.name: Left/right key is down
conditions.description: Test if a specific left or right keyboard key is currently held down, e.g. left shift.

conditions.name: Is keyboard lock supported
conditions.description: True if the current browser/platform supports using keyboard lock.

conditions.name: On keyboard locked
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Lock keyboard' action after successfully locking the keyboard.

conditions.name: On keyboard lock error
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Lock keyboard' action after failing to lock the keyboard.

actions.name: Lock keyboard
actions.description: Request to lock the keyboard so keypresses are always received by the project rather than the browser/application. NOTE: this only takes effect in fullscreen mode.

params.name: Keys
params.description: A comma-separated array of keys to lock. Leave empty to request to lock all keys.

actions.name: Unlock keyboard
actions.description: Unlock a previous keyboard lock, restoring the default handling of key presses.

expressions.name: LastKeyCode
expressions.description: Get the key code for the last pressed key.

expressions.name: StringFromKeyCode
expressions.description: Get a character string representing a key code.

params.name: Key code
params.description: The key code to get a string from

expressions.name: TypedKey
expressions.description: Get the typed key string for the last pressed key.
